scripts.gas: forge clean; forge test --isolate --gas-report | bin/extract-gas | tee gas.txt
scripts.sizes: forge clean; forge build --sizes | bin/extract-sizes | tee sizes.txt
scripts.coverage: forge coverage --report summary --report lcov | bin/extract-coverage | tee coverage.txt
scripts.pre-checkin: yarn fmt && yarn lint && yarn test && yarn coverage && yarn gas && yarn sizes && echo "ready for checkin"
